name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Commander (Retro)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Commander (Retro) 
G.I. Joe Classified Cobra Commander is included with the Cobra H.I.S.S. Tank HasLab crowdfunded project that ended in August of 2023. 


Cobra Commander is featured on retro blister card, white border, comes unpunched on thicker card stock and English file card on card back. 


Includes 8 accessories including alternate hands, a backpack holster for the venom blaster accessory and a miniature globe with pet cobra.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Storm Shadow (Retro)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Storm Shadow (Retro) 
This Storm Shadow figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and 10 character-inspired accessories.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Lady Jaye (Retro)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Lady Jaye (Retro) 
Lady Jaye Retro is exclusive to Walmart with limited quantities available on HasbroPulse.com.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Gung-Ho (Retro)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Gung-Ho (Retro) 
Born into a large back-swamp Cajun clan, Gung-Ho won a reputation as a bare-knuckle brawler, joined the Marines at 18, and graduated top of his class from boot camp. Exclusive to Walmart with limited quantities available on HasbroPulse.com.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Destro (Retro)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Destro (Retro) 
Destro is the faceless power behind M.A.R.S., the largest manufacturer of state-of-the-art weaponry. Exclusive to Walmart with limited quantities available on HasbroPulse.com.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Baroness (Retro)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Baroness (Retro) 
The Baroness Retro is exclusive to Walmart with limited quantities available on HasbroPulse.com.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Snake Eyes (Retro)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Snake Eyes (Retro) 
This Snake Eyes figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and 7 accessories inspired by the character and the iconic “Silent Interlude” comic cover. And with classic package art, the G.I. Joe Classified Series Snake Eyes package will make a mark on shelves.



Includes: figure and 7 accessories.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Crimson Guard (Retro)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Crimson Guard (Retro) 
This Crimson Guard figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and 6 character-inspired accessories. And with classic package art, the G.I. Joe Classified Series Crimson Guard package will make a mark on shelves.



Includes: figure and 6 accessories.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Metal-Head (Iron Grenadier)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Metal-Head (Iron Grenadier) 
Metal-Head is a walking anti-tank weapon serving Destro’s Iron Grenadiers. He can launch high-explosive missiles and visually guide them to their objectives. "The real targeting computer is his brain, and it doesn't have an 'off' switch. This guy is so wrapped-up with his work that even when he sits down for dinner, he's locking onto the mashed potatoes."



Includes 28 character-inspired accessory pieces including removeable backpack missile racks, "hip-swivel" holster tubes, 6 missiles with blast effects, alternate hair, helmet, knife, and two weapons.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Mutt & Junkyard
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Mutt & Junkyard 
Mutt & Junkyard are characters from the G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero toyline, comic books, and animated series. Mutt is the G.I. Joe Team’s dog handler, and Junkyard is his loyal K9 partner, a Rottweiler.



Includes alternate "good boy" head for Junkyard, removable helmet, 2x goggles, face mask, 3 sets of alternate hands (for dog commands and training), knife, hand gun that can be stored on Mutt's thigh holster, scoped rifle and baton.



Mutt is a natural with animals. He likes them and they like him. The problem is that he gets along better with dogs than he does with humans. "If you're sitting next to Mutt in the mess hall, don't try filching anything from his tray-he'll bite your leg off!"

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Clutch with VAMP
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Clutch with VAMP 
G.I. Joe Classified Series line, Clutch with VAMP (Multi-Purpose Attack Vehicle) comes ready for adventure, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability. This Clutch figure contains 5 character-inspired accessory pieces including 2 helmets, wrench, and 2 weapon accessories. The VAMP is bursting with accessories and details including a fire axe, extinguisher, 2 fuel cans, side mirror, tow hook, and cannon. 


Clutch was a mechanic at Manny's Mean Machines and was heavily involved in racing street machines prior to enlistment. "He greases his hair with motor oil, rarely shaves, and chews on the same toothpick for months."



Includes: Figure with 5 accessories and vehicle with 21 unassembled pieces and is exclusive on Hasbro Pulse.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra H.I.S.S. Fire Team 788
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra H.I.S.S. Fire Team 788 
YO JOE! G.I. JOE explodes into a larger than life era with brand new 6 inch scale figures, evolving classic charact ers fans know and love into a highly articulated 6inch scale with premium deco and details. The G.I. JOE Classified Series Cobra H.I.S.S. Fire Team 788, #110 Set Features a classic design updated to bring the Officer, Range Viper, and Infantry into the modern era in a Deluxe 3 figure Troop building pack bursting with 35 accessory pieces inspired by the characters’ rich history. This three figure set contains 35 character inspired accessory pieces including 11 blast and laser effects, 3 backpacks, officer and infantry helmets, bandolier, bandana, axe, sai, knife, and over a dozen weapon accessories.



The closed box packaging showcases accessory loadout, character specific File Card Icons, and original artwork perfect for display with other Cobra H.I.S.S.themed products (each sold separately). Available for preorder on 7/22/2023 exclusively on HasbroPulse.com starting at 5 pm EST for Hasbro Pulse Premium members and 6 pm EST for all fans.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Parth “Wolf Spider” Varma
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Parth “Wolf Spider” Varma 
Parth Varma hails from a family of doctors, but intense desire for action pushed him to train as a helicopter EMT and then as a Coast Guard Aviation Survival Technician. After seeing his daring rescues G.I. Joe recruiters honed his zeal for thrills with modified SPIE and Pararescue training, crafting him into an exfiltration expert. Never missing his target, Wolf Spider drops from the heavens to evacuate fellow Joes from the most dire situations.



This Night Force Parth Wolf Spider Varma figure contains 7 accessories including helmet, mask, goggles, backpack, and 3 weapon accessories!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Shadow Tracker
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Shadow Tracker 
Shadow Tracker works for Cobra as a wilderness hunter and guide. He tracks his prey using primal instinct: he hears the dark whispers of the jungle, senses distant footfalls in the earth, and tastes his victim’s fear in the wind. When his quarry sets foot in the jungle, Shadow Tracker instantly knows and starts the hunt.



This Cobra Shadow Tracker figure contains 8 character-inspired accessory pieces including 2 removable masks, knife, hatchet, quiver, and bow and arrow; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Tunnel Rat (Night Force)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Tunnel Rat (Night Force) 
Nicky Tunnel Rat Lee’s Brooklyn family is Trinidadian Chinese with branches of Irish, Spanish, and Native American thrown in. Tunnel Rat figures he can shoot straighter, bite harder, and run faster than anything he’s ever encountered in an enemy tunnel, so what’s to worry.



This Night Force Tunnel Rat figure contains 9 character-inspired accessory pieces including goggles, backpack with 2 attachable flashlights, satchel, knife, and 2 weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Dreadnok Buzzer
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Dreadnok Buzzer 
Buzzer was an extreme left-wing Cambridge sociology don who went to Australia to research the biker gang phenomenon only to be transformed into the very object of his research. Years of intellectual displeasure and extreme indignation at society’s two-faced morality manifested into the intense desire to chainsaw apart the expensive geegaws of technological society.



Includes sunglasses, chain blade, axe bat, knife, his signature chainsaw, and a weapon accessory; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Jason “Shockwave” Faria
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Jason “Shockwave” Faria 
Shockwave was the youngest member of the Detroit Police Department S.W.A.T. Team, and the holder of two citations for bravery when he applied for, and was accepted by the Joe Team. Everybody on a S.W.A.T. Team has a specific job, like in a choir. Shockwave is the door kicker. He’s the first inside and the first to find out how bad it really is. He's also a half-decent tenor when his voice is in shape.



Includes a riot shield, hat, 2 knives, nightstick, and 4 weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow his gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Agent Helix
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Agent Helix 
Agent Helix is a covert operations officer with advanced martial arts training and expert marksmanship. An Alpha-Level G.I. Joe Operative bent on stopping the rise of Cobra, she sees the world in data sets that allow her to anticipate the probable outcomes of any action. Her distinctive "whirlwind attack" is an overpowering combination of kicks and firepower utilizing her Olympic-class gymnastic abilities. 


Includes 2 mantis blades, 2 swords, backpack sheath, machette, and 2 weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all her gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series General Clayton “Hawk” Abernathy
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series General Clayton “Hawk” Abernathy 
Hawk was the original field commander of the Joe team before he got his General's star and was booted upstairs to honcho the entire G.I. Joe Operation. He's a West Point graduate and has a list of special education credits as long as his arm, but he still managed to get the main body of his experience out there where it counts—on the battle field.



Includes: helmet, 2 pairs of goggles, 2 pistols and 2 pump action shotguns.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Dreadnok Ripper
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Dreadnok Ripper 
There are devils in Tasmania and Ripper is probably the meanest of them all. He is a professional criminal motivated by greed and a malignant dislike for the niceties of civilization—except for motorcycles and grape soda.



Includes his signature power jaws, knife, glasses, and 3 weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra H.I.S.S. Gunner
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra H.I.S.S. Gunner 
G.I. Joe Classified Cobra H.I.S.S. Gunner is included with the Cobra H.I.S.S. Tank HasLab crowdfunded project that ended in August of 2023. 


Includes alternate hands and two weapon accessories.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra H.I.S.S. Tactician
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra H.I.S.S. Tactician 
G.I. Joe Classified Cobra H.I.S.S. Tactician is included with the Cobra H.I.S.S. Tank HasLab crowdfunded project that ended in August of 2023. 


Includes alternate hands and two weapon accessories.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra H.I.S.S. Driver
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra H.I.S.S. Driver 
G.I. Joe Classified Cobra H.I.S.S. Driver is included with the Cobra H.I.S.S. Tank HasLab crowdfunded project that ended in August of 2023. 


Includes alternate hands and two weapon accessories.

figure_link: Python Patrol Tele-Viper & Cobra Flight Pod (Trubble Bubble)
name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Python Patrol Tele-Viper & Cobra Flight Pod (Trubble Bubble)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Python Patrol Tele-Viper & Cobra Flight Pod (Trubble Bubble) 
G.I. Classified Series Python Patrol Tele-Vipers drop into battle in their one-troop jet pods while jamming Joe communication frequencies. They bring nothing but trouble!



This Python Patrol Tele-Viper & Cobra Flight Pod (Trubble Bubble) figure and vehicle set contains 12 character-inspired accessories including two alternate heads, backpack with modular communications array, an aerial mine with removable hatch, and 2 missile accessories; plus a footlocker to stow their gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Officer (Python Patrol)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Officer (Python Patrol) 
G.I. Joe Classified Series Python Patrol Cobra Officer (#97) is trained at Cobra leadership schools in stealth tactics and coordinating infantry, armor, artillery, and air-support instantaneously. The slithering mastermind is dedicated to destroying G.I. Joe and the free world.



This Python Patrol Cobra Officer figure contains 9 character-inspired accessories including alternate head, goggles, knife, backpack holster, and 3 weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Copperhead (Python Patrol)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Copperhead (Python Patrol) 
An inveterate gambler, G.I. Joe Classified Copperhead (Python Patrol) has gambled his way into hacking through the swamps in the service of Cobra – likely to pay off his misbegotten debts. Without enough money to cover what he owes, he joined Python Patrol for the extra paychecks.



Contains 4 character-inspired accessories including a machete, backpack holster, and weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Steel Corps Troopers
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Steel Corps Troopers 
G.I. Joe Classified Series Steel Corps. Action Figure 2-Pack announced in Feb 2023. These nameless, faceless Joes are the vanguard troops who launch into battle and hold fast at the front line.



Includes 28 character-inspired accessory pieces including 2 J.U.M.P. jetpacks, alternate heads, 13 blast effects, and 11 weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all their gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Mole Rat
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Mole Rat 
While Cobra headhunts top scientists and researchers from across the globe, less-qualified recruits wind up as Mole Rats, quarriers and miners seeking new energy sources to power Cobra’s war machine. Extracting deposits of volatile Dark Energon has sparked certain troopers to become mindless husks bent on destroying anything in their path.



This Mole Rat figure contains 7 character-inspired accessories including backpack , scanner, cannister, mutated head, and a drill trigger with drill bit and weapon accessory; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Snow Serpent (Deluxe)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Snow Serpent (Deluxe) 
Snakes usually tend to be cold blooded, but Snow Serpents thrive in polar temperatures as the frontline arctic infantry troopers of the Cobra forces. They can traverse vast icy plains and then vanish in a snow drift remaining still for hours or even days only to emerge with a lethal barrage on their unsuspecting foes.



This Deluxe Snow Serpent figure contains 20 character-inspired accessories including snowboard, snowshoes, backpack, wolf pelt cape, wolf head cowl, goggles, knife, and 12 weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Desert Commando Snake Eyes
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Desert Commando Snake Eyes 
Subject was Ranger qualified and served in Long Range Recon Patrols in Southeast Asia. Left the service to study mystic martial arts with the same Ninja family that produced Storm Shadow. Snake-Eyes was living an ascetic existence alone in the High Sierras with a pet wolf named Timber when he was recruited for the G.I. Joe Team. Snake Eyes is proficient in 12 different unarmed fighting systems (Karate, Kung-Fu, Jujitsu) and is highly skilled in the use of edged weapons. Has received extensive training in mountaineering, underwater demolitions, jungle, desert and arctic survival, and some form of holistic medicine. Qualified Expert: All small arms.



"The man is a total mystery, but he's real good at his job, heck, he's the best."

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Crimson Alley Viper
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Crimson Alley Viper 
To consolidate their power within Cobra, the Crimson Strike Team (Tomax, Xamot, and the Baroness) have reassigned their most loyal and ruthlessly brutal troops to the Crimson Alley Viper squadrons. Crimson Alley Vipers were recently sent to quell a strange outbreak among the Mole Rat troopers excavating Dark Energon Mines.



This Crimson Alley Viper figure contains 10 character-inspired accessories including a visor mask, riot shield, grappling hook, backpack, 2 knives, and 2 weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Jodie “Shooter” Craig (Nightforce)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Jodie “Shooter” Craig (Nightforce) 
Jodie "Shooter" Craig may spend days motionless waiting for her target to appear. Then her esoteric knowledge of wind deflection and bullet drop along with precise breath control guide her as she flexes her trigger finger.



This Nightforce Jodie "Shooter" Craig figure contains 7 character-inspired accessories including alternate hair, alternate head with gas mask, knife, and 2 weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all her gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Flint (Tiger Force)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Flint (Tiger Force) 
Flint was a Rhodes Scholar and earned his degree in English Lit before applying the tenacity and concentration he had used so well scholastically to grind his way through G.I. Joe recruitment. Flint is a mission specialist and leader, providing tactical information and training to the team to make sure they’re ready for whatever Cobra throws at them.



Includes beret, machete, and 4 weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear!



Exclusive to Target with limited quantities available on HasbroPulse.com.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Vypra (Python Patrol)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Vypra (Python Patrol) 
Vypra allegedly offered her services to Cobra Commander as a mercenary and intelligence courier by audaciously sneaking into his private business meeting at Extensive Enterprises. Intrigued by her boldness he brought her aboard.



This Python Patrol Vypra figure contains 6 character-inspired accessory pieces including skull mask, katana and wakizashi swords, quiver, and bow and arrow; plus a footlocker to stow all her gear! 


Exclusive to Target with limited quantities available on HasbroPulse.com.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Robert (Grunt) Graves
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Robert (Grunt) Graves 
Grunt is a highly motivated, systematic individual. He's a stand-up guy who doesn't blow his cool in a fire-fight.



Robert "Grunt" Graves comes ready for adventure, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability. This Robert "Grunt" Graves figure contains 8 character-inspired accessories including 2 helmets, knife, backpack, fold-down team awareness device, and 3 weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Low-Light
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Low-Light 
As a child Low-Light was afraid of the dark until one precarious outdoor expedition. He was found three weeks later with a flashlight and a grin from ear to ear. "Wait until dark. It doesn’t matter what field of fire the bad guys control—the night belongs to Low-Light."



Low-Light comes ready for adventure, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability. This Low-Light figure contains 10 character-inspired accessories including backpack, weapon case, knife, his signature goggles, and 2 weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Crimson Viper
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Crimson Viper 
Professing loyalty to the secret cabal formed by the Baroness, Tomax, and Xamot, Crimson Vipers are hand-selected not only for their superior skills and ruthless efficiency, but also for their overwhelming greed. "We attack like a crimson tide washing over the battlefield, leaving only destruction in our wake."



Crimson Viper comes ready for adventure, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability. This Crimson Viper figure contains 5 character-inspired accessories including backpack, bandana, goggles, and 2 weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Firefly (Classic)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Firefly (Classic) 
No one knows Firefly's real name or what he looks like. He is known by his work. Even COBRA Commander doesn't know much about Firefly. His fees are paid into a numbered Swiss bank account and are always payable in advance. He makes no guarantees and gives no refunds.



This fan-demanded G.I. Joe Classified Series Firefly action figure features premium detailing and articulation for poseability to create dynamic dioramas - or you can play with it, which we recommend. He's 84 in the G.I Joe Classified Series sequence. The closed-box packaging showcases accessory loadout, character-specific File Card Icons, original artwork, and unique digital renders that are perfect for display. 


Includes: goggles, two guns, a backpack, a wheeled drone, explosives, and other accessories, including a knife in case he wants to take a stab at hand-to-hand combat. Wow!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Tunnel Rat
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Tunnel Rat 
New to the G.I. Joe Classified Series line, Tunnel Rat comes ready for adventure, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability. This Tunnel Rat figure contains 8 character-inspired accessories including goggles, backpack with 2 attachable flashlights, satchel, knife, and 2 weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear! Nicky "Tunnel Rat" Lee’s Brooklyn family is Trinidadian Chinese with branches of Irish, Spanish, and Native American thrown in. "Tunnel Rat figures he can shoot straighter, bite harder, and run faster than anything he’s ever encountered in an enemy tunnel, so what’s to worry."

figure_link: Crimson Strike Team: Baroness, Tomax & Xamot
name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Crimson Strike Team: Baroness, Tomax & Xamot
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Crimson Strike Team: Baroness, Tomax & Xamot 
As tensions within the leadership of Cobra continue to rise, the Baroness in alliance with Tomax and Xamot has formed an elite squad of troopers loyal only to them. Combined, they are the Crimson Strike Team, ready to seize control in the board room or battlefield.



Set contains 27 character-inspired accessories including 2 pairs of glasses, alternate hair and 2 alternate heads for Baronness, 3 figure stands, and 19 golden weapon accessories

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Eel
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Eel 
Eels are the underwater demolitions specialists of the COBRA legions. They staff and operate the Cobra marine outposts disguised as off-shore drilling rigs and augment the crews of larger Cobra naval vessels.



Eels undergo a rigorous training program in the warm shark and pirate infested waters of the Cayman Islands in the Caribbean and in the frigid dark depths of the North Atlantic. They become proficient in using closed-circuit underwater breathing and electronic detection gear. Their training regimen includes marine structural engineering, explosive ordnance, underwater fighting techniques, and marine geology.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Ralph “Nunchuck” Badducci
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Ralph “Nunchuck” Badducci 
Trained by the best of the best himself, Ralph "Nunchuk" Badducci serves G.I. Joe as their chief Martial Arts Instructor passing that knowledge along to the entire team. With his devastating attacks Nunchuk is truly a Ninja force to be reckoned with.



Ralph "Nunchuk" Badducci comes ready for adventure, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability. This Ralph "Nunchuk" Badducci figure contains 7 character-inspired accessories including a dagger, 2 swords, 2 claws and 2 of his namesake nunchaku; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear!

figure_link: Cobra Tele-Viper & Cobra Flight Pod (Trubble Bubble)
name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Tele-Viper & Cobra Flight Pod (Trubble Bubble)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Tele-Viper & Cobra Flight Pod (Trubble Bubble) 
Tele-Viper & Cobra Flight Pod (Trubble Bubble) comes ready for adventure, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability. This Tele-Viper & Cobra Flight Pod (Trubble Bubble) figure and vehicle set contains 9 character-inspired accessories including two alternate heads, backpack with modular communications array, an aerial mine with removable hatch, and 2 missile accessories; plus a footlocker to stow their gear! Tele-Vipers drop into battle in their one-troop jet pods while jamming Joe communication frequencies. They bring nothing but trouble!



Includes: Figure, Vehicle, and 9 accessories

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Tripwire, Apsara & M.A.C.L.E.O.D.
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Tripwire, Apsara & M.A.C.L.E.O.D. 
Tripwire freaks people out. He's always clumsy, jittery and dropping things except when he's working with high explosives. Explosives are the only things that calm him down.



Tripwire, Apsara, & M.A.C.L.E.O.D. Deluxe pack contains 15 character-inspired accessories including his bomb-sniffing rat "Apsara," robot M.A.C.L.E.O.D. (Mobile Armored Control Lever for Ordnance Disposal) with remote control; mine sweeper, heavy and light armor gear, neck guards, and helmets, 2 mines, backpack, and weapon accessory; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Nightforce David “Big Ben” Bennett
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Nightforce David “Big Ben” Bennett 
To qualify for the SAS, a candidate must complete the "Long Drag" in under 20 hours. It's a forced march over 64km through marshes and rough, hilly terrain, carrying 25kg of equipment. Big Ben finished in 12, had a bit of supper, and volunteered to search for others who got lost in the moors



New to the G.I. Joe Classified Series line, Nightforce David "Big Ben" Bennett comes ready for adventure, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability. This Nightforce David “Big Ben” Bennett figure contains 4 character-inspired accessories including alternate head with gas mask, and 3 weapon accessories.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Range-Viper
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Range-Viper 
Range-Vipers have an unusually high tolerance for discomfort. They subsist on the vermin they catch, must procure all their own supplies, and build their own shelters. Once dropped into the field, they don’t cost anything to feed, clothe or arm making them ideal cannon fodder. 


This Range-Viper figure contains 8 character-inspired accessories including a bandolier, bandana, sai, pickaxe, backpack, and 3 weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all their gear! 


Includes: Figure and 8 accessories

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Philip “Chuckles” Provost
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Philip “Chuckles” Provost 
Stop me if you’ve heard this one: guy walks into a bar on Cobra Island, the Coconut Palm to be exact. After tossing back a few with the locals this Chuckles fellow, kind of a joker, discovers there’s a hidden safe upstairs with a briefcase full of secret documents and millions in gold. So the trick is, can he nab the case and 23 skidoo without blowing his cover or will the Crimson Strike Team bring down a world of hurt on him? Either way at least he got lei’d.



Includes 14 character-inspired accessories including a briefcase, top secret folder, sunglasses, cassette player with headphones, binoculars, 2 sets of handcuffs, alternate head with bruised face, alternate hands with brass knuckles, and 2 weapon accessories.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Scrap-Iron & Anti-Armor Drone (Deluxe)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Scrap-Iron & Anti-Armor Drone (Deluxe) 
Scrap Iron is an anti-armor specialist and weapons designer whose passion for precision drove him to develop his own munitions. His remote-controlled drone is his latest development for Cobra



Scrap-Iron & Anti-Armor Drone comes ready for adventure, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability. This Scrap-Iron & Anti-Armor Drone figure contains 11 character-inspired accessories including his missile-launching drone, drone controls, removable helmet, 6 blast effects, 2 missiles and a weapon accessory; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear!



True to his name, this figure brings perfection, metal, and destruction to a whole new level with his lazer-guided, rocket-loaded, piezo-electric Anti-Armor Drone, complete with blast effects and other character-inspired accessories!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Edward “Torpedo” Leiaioha
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Edward “Torpedo” Leiaioha 
Dive, dive my darling! Take to the seas with your very own G.I. Joe Classified Series 6-Inch Edward Torpedo Leiaioha Action Figure. The closed-box packaging showcases all your great accessories, character-specific File Card Icons, original artwork, and unique digital renders that are perfect for display. Or you could just open it and play with it in the tub. (We don't judge.) 


This Edward “Torpedo” Leialoha figure contains 6 character-inspired accessories including his scuba gear with air tank, removable fins, and weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear! Native Hawaiian and strict vegetarian Torpedo was SCUBA instructor prior to joining the Joes. Spending so much time alone underwater makes him come across as aloof, but he’s a consummate professional.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Copperhead
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Copperhead 
An inveterate gambler, Copperhead has gambled his way into hacking through the swamps in the service of Cobra – likely to pay off his misbegotten debts.s…wherever there’s trouble, G.I. Joe is there. 


Cobra Copperhead comes ready for adventure, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability. This Cobra Copperhead figure contains 4 character-inspired accessories including a machete, backpack holster, and weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Craig “Rock ‘N Roll” McConnel
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Craig “Rock ‘N Roll” McConnel 
Whether he’s surfing waves on the beaches of Malibu, playing his bass, or charging headfirst into oncoming fire, Rock ’N Roll is ready to cut loose.



This Craig “Rock ‘N Roll” McConnel figure contains 7 character-inspired accessories including removable helmet, walkie-talkie, bandolier belt, 2 alternate hands (fist and “sign of the horns”), and weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Shipwreck
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Shipwreck 
Whether swabbing the deck or sneaking into Extensive Enterprises Shipwreck is shipshape to the last detail.



This Shipwreck figure contains 6 character-inspired accessories including his faithful parrot “Polly,” coiled rope, grappling hook, weapon accessories, and removable hair to swap out his signature dixie cup cover; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Arctic B.A.T.
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Arctic B.A.T. 
Arctic B.A.T. comes ready for adventure, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability. This Arctic B.A.T. figure contains 8 character-inspired accessories including chainsaw hand attachment, backpack, 2 weapon accessories, alternate head, and 3 interchangeable chest plates to customize your figure for troop building possibilities; plus a footlocker to stow all its gear! 


Includes: Figure and 8 accessories

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Valkyries
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Valkyries 
These Cobra Troopers are not to be underestimated or trifled with.



This Cobra Valkyries pack is bursting with 2 figures and 25 character-inspired accessories including 2 trooper helmets, an officer helmet, alternate head, 2 backpacks, 9 blast effects, and 10 weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all their gear! The Cobra Valkyries stalk the battlefield as “choosers of the slain” ushering any enemies who cross their path straight to Valhalla.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Snow Job
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Snow Job 
An Olympic Biathlon contender Snow Job accepted recruitment into the Joes for the vigorous training regimen and decided he liked the challenge more. He’s been known to bullseye Arctic B.A.T.S. in gale-force polar winds from more than 2 klicks away. 


This Snow Job figure contains 13 character-inspired accessories including snowshoes, skis, ski poles, goggles, backpack, alternate uncovered head, and weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Python Crimson Guard (Python Patrol)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Python Crimson Guard (Python Patrol) 
G.I. Joe Classified Python Crimson Guard (Python Patrol).



Includes sword, sheath, assault rifle with bayonet, ammo clip, hand gun, knife and backpack.



Target exclusive.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Dusty (Tiger Force)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Dusty (Tiger Force) 
G.I. Joe Classified Dusty (Tiger Force). 


Includes head covering, goggles, backpack, weapon, weapon ammo clip and knife.



Exclusive to Target.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Vincent R. Falcone (Falcon)
description:

This Vincent R. "Falcon" Falcone figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and 4 character-inspired accessories including his signature beret, backpack, and weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear.

description:

"Bazooka" Katzenbogen figure come ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and 7 character-inspired accessories including his signature helmet and missile launcher; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear! And with custom artwork by Anjin Anhut, the G.I. Joe Classified Series David L. "Bazooka" Katzenbogen package will make a mark on shelves.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Kamakura
description:

This G.I. Joe Classified Kamakura action figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and 11 character-inspired accessories including cloaked and uncloaked heads, 2 katana, 2 daggers, ninja spear and additional weapon accessories; plus a footlocker to stow all his gear! And with custom artwork by Ivan Shavrin, the G.I. Joe Classified Series Kamakura package will make a mark on shelves.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Gabriel Kelly (Barbecue)
description:

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Serpentor and Air Chariot
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Serpentor and Air Chariot 
Serpentor and Air Chariot PulseCon exclusive includes Air Chariot vehicle, and 8 character-inspired accessories including fanned and hooded cowls, serpent staff, cape, gladius sword, and his pet king cobra Bucephalus.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Python Patrol Officer
description:

And with custom artwork by Robert Sammelin, the G.I. Joe Classified Series Recondo package will make a mark on shelves.

description:

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Snake Eyes & Timber (v2)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Snake Eyes & Timber (v2) 
The G.I. JOE Classified Series Snake Eyes & Timber 6” Action Figure features a classic Snake Eyes-inspired design updated to bring the G.I. Joe ninja into the modern era, plus 12 accessories inspired by the character’s rich history, as well as the inclusion of his wolf companion, Timber. Accessories include accessories including an array of weapons, alternate hands, and a fangs-bared alternate head for Timber; plus a footlocker to stow all their gear! And with custom artwork by Greg Manchess, the G.I. Joe Classified Series Snake Eyes & Timber package will make a mark on shelves.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Blue Ninjas 2 Pack
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Blue Ninjas 2 Pack 
These G.I. Joe Classified Blue Ninjas figures come ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and 16 character-inspired accessories including an arsenal of ninja weapons and alternate heads wearing Oni and Kitsune masks; plus a footlocker to stow all their gear! And with custom artwork by Billy Christian, the G.I. Joe Classified Series Blue Ninjas 2 Pack will make a mark on shelves.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Crimson Guard

This Zarana figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and 6 character-inspired accessories. And with custom artwork by Marcus Williams, the G.I. Joe Classified Series Zarana package will make a mark on shelves.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Viper Officer & Vipers 3 Pack
description:

These Cobra Viper Officer & Vipers figures come ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and 32 character-inspired accessories.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Sgt. Stalker
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Sgt. Stalker 
Lonzo Stalker Wilkinson, Sgt Stalker features a classic design updated to bring the G.I. Joe Medic and Interpreter into the modern era, plus accessories inspired by the character’s rich history.

description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Dr. Mindbender (Deluxe) 
GI Joe Classified Dr. Mindbender Deluxe action figure. This Dr. Mindbender figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and 18 character-inspired accessories.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Viper (Python Patrol)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Viper (Python Patrol) 
This Cobra Viper figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and 5 character-inspired accessories. And with custom artwork by Anthony Petrie, the G.I. Joe Classified Series Cobra Viper package will make a mark on shelves.



Features a classic design updated to bring the Python Patrol Cobra Foot Soldier into the modern era, plus accessories inspired by the character’s rich history.



Includes: figure and 5 accessories.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series B.A.T. (Python Patrol)
description:

This B.A.T. figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and 6 character-inspired accessories. And with custom artwork by Muhammad Firdaus, the G.I. Joe Classified Series B.A.T. package will make a mark on shelves.



Features a classic design updated to bring the Python Patrol Cobra Environmental Specialist into the modern era and accessories inspired by the character’s rich history.



Includes: figure and 6 accessories.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Duke & RAM Cycle (Tiger Force)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Duke & RAM Cycle (Tiger Force) 
The G.I. Joe Classified Series evolves the characters fans know and love into a highly articulated 6-inch scale with premium deco and detailing. The Classified Series Tiger Force Duke & RAM Action Figure and Vehicle features a classic design updated to bring the G.I. Joe Leader and RAM cycle into the modern era and 8 accessories inspired by the character’s rich history, including weapons, backpack, binoculars and a footlocker to stow all his gear. Designed by artist David Marquez, the packing features custom art that provides a unique style to the Tiger Force Duke & Ram cycle pack.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Stuart “Outback” Selkirk
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Stuart “Outback” Selkirk 
This Stuart “Outback” Selkirk figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and 7 character-inspired accessories. And with custom artwork by Hartley Combs, the G.I. Joe Classified Series Stuart “Outback” Selkirk package will make a mark on shelves.



Features a classic design updated to bring the Tiger Force Environmental Specialist into the modern era and accessories inspired by his history.



Includes: figure and 7 accessories.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Croc Master & Fiona
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Croc Master & Fiona 
These Croc Master & Fiona figures come ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and 7 character-inspired accessories. And with custom artwork by Luke Preece, the G.I. Joe Classified Series Croc Master & Fiona package will make a mark on shelves.



This Croc Master action figure comes with an additional crocodile figure of Croc Master’s loyal pet Fiona. A great addition to any G.I. Joe fan’s action figure collection.



Includes: G.I. Joe Classified Series Croc Master & Fiona action figures and 7 accessories.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Officer
description:

This Cobra Officer figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and 9 character-inspired accessories. And with custom artwork by François Coutu, the G.I. Joe Classified Series Cobra Officer package will make a mark on shelves.

description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Storm Shadow (Classic) 
This figure features a classic design updated to bring the Cobra Ninja Operative into the modern era, plus accessories inspired by the character’s rich history.



This Storm Shadow figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and 9 character-inspired accessories. And with custom artwork by Yuko Shimizu, the G.I. Joe Classified Series Storm Shadow package will make a mark on shelves.



Includes: figure and 9 accessories.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Alley Viper
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Alley Viper 
This Alley Viper figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and 9 character-inspired accessories. And with custom artwork by Tom Whalen, the G.I. Joe Classified Series Alley Viper package will make a mark on shelves.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series B.A.T.
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series B.A.T. 
This B.A.T. figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and 8 character-inspired accessories. And with custom artwork by Fir (Muhammad Firdaus), the G.I. Joe Classified Series B.A.T. package will make a mark on shelves.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Barbecue
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Barbecue 
This Gabriel Barbecue Kelly figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and 5 character-inspired accessories. And with custom artwork by John Giang, the G.I. Joe Classified Series Gabriel Barbecue Kelly package will make a mark on shelves.



Announced in June 2021 and includes foam tanks, nozzle and two axes. Barbecue has heroism in his DNA. He comes from a long line of firefighters -- six generations of Kellys before him served to save as members of the Boston fire department. As the temperature rises, his threat response rises along with it. He displays incredible focus and determination and lives for the rush of the thrilling rescue.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Zartan (Master of Disguise)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Zartan (Master of Disguise) 
G.I. Joe Classified Zartan, Master of Disguise action figure is sensitive to heat and cold and will change colors in cold weather, under warm water. Includes 6 alternate faces, backpack to store extra face, rifle, pistol, dagger, cowl, bow and arrows. Box has unique wheel to change Zartan’s face. 


Coming Fall 2021 to Pulse Con.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Snake Eyes & Timber: Alpha Commandos
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Snake Eyes & Timber: Alpha Commandos 
G.I. Joe Classified Alpha Commandos Snake Eyes & Timber. Includes: 3 Machine guns, Silencer, Knife, Pistol, 2 Head sculpts

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Breaker with RAM Cycle
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Breaker with RAM Cycle 
This Alvin Breaker Kinney figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and character-inspired accessories. And with custom artwork by John Tyler Christopher, the G.I. Joe Classified Series Special Missions: Cobra Island Alvin “Breaker” Kinney with RAM Cycle package will make a mark on shelves.



Includes: figure, vehicle, and 2 accessories.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Roadblock (Heavy Artillery)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Roadblock (Heavy Artillery) 
This Heavy Artillery Roadblock figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high posable and character-inspired accessories, including a heavy artillery blaster and removable helmet.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Major Bludd
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Major Bludd 
G.I. Joe Classified Major Bludd includes helmet, rocket backpack with two missiles and two hand pistols. The rush Major Bludd gets from the chaos he causes in battle is second only to the excitement he gets from collecting his pay. One of the best prepared Cobra mercenaries, he is proficient with every form of infantry weapon and uses advanced tactics and psychological warfare to win at all cost. He has no belief system beyond landing the largest payday, and no deed is too despicable if it boosts his bankroll.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Flint
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Flint 
Flint comes with removeable beret, shotgun, flak jacket, handgun, shotgun opens up for reloading and also has a back holster sling.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Lady Jaye
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Lady Jaye 
Lady Jaye comes with removeable hat, tactical knife, extra spear heads, backpack, go-pro camera, javelin launcher.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Infantry
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Infantry 
The G.I. JOE Classified Series Cobra Infantry Action Figure features a classic design updated to bring the iconic Cobra troopers into the modern era. Includes two hand pistols, knife, automatic rifle and alternate helmet. Weapons can plug into back of the figure to complete the tactical look.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Zartan
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Zartan 
The G.I. JOE Classified Series Zartan action figure. Accessories included are alternate mask with backpack which includes the ability to attach tactical knife, pistol. Includes , monkey paw and snake head. Zartan features a removable hood. Zartan is a true chameleon, whose natural abilities in mimicry, acting, prosthetic effects, and disguise have been enhanced by significant genetic modification. He can assume any identity at any time with absolute precision. The true identity of Zartan is hidden behind dozens of aliases, making it nearly impossible to piece together his history and causing his sense of self to break down and destabilize his already chaotic mind. Zartan is also the head of an anarchist biker group called the Dreadnoks.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Viper (Cobra Island)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Viper (Cobra Island) 
The G.I. JOE Classified Series Cobra Viper action figure. Features mirrored mask, blaster rifle with removable magazines, removable glossy goggles, backpack with rope, handkerchief.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Firefly
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Firefly 
The G.I. JOE Classified Series Firefly action figure in light gray urban camo. Fitted with bomb proof vest with explosive pouches and red lens goggles. Includes backpack where you can attach dynamite, tools, explosive drone perch, data pad and blaster weapon. Firefly is undetectable, but his work is unmistakable. The Cobra Covert Ops agent is a faceless master who operates without leaving a physical trail or digital footprint. In and out without a trace, the anonymity of his destruction serves as his calling card. He trained as ninja, mastering skills like stealth and infiltration before turning to demolitions and sabotage. He operates as the loudest silent ninja in the world, and even in the blinding blaze of his carefully crafted explosions, Firefly manages to remain hidden in the shadows.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Scarlett (Origins)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Scarlett (Origins) 
This Scarlett Figure Comes Ready For Action, With Multiple Points Of Articulation For High Poseability And A Character-Inspired Accessory, Including Scarlett’s Iconic Crossbow. And With Custom Artwork By Magali Villaneuve.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Baroness (Origins)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Baroness (Origins) 
This Baroness figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and movie-inspired accessories, including her signature submachine gun with silencer. And with custom artwork by Jen Bartel.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Akiko (Origins)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Akiko (Origins) 
This Akiko figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and movie-inspired accessories, including his signature sword.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Storm Shadow (Origins)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Storm Shadow (Origins) 
This Storm Shadow figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and movie-inspired accessories, including his signature sword.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Snake Eyes (Origins)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Snake Eyes (Origins) 
This Snake Eyes figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and movie-inspired accessories, including his signature sword. And with custom artwork by John Guydo.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Destro (Profit Director)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Destro (Profit Director) 
The deluxe Pimp Daddy Profit Director Destro is a fan channel exclusive. Along with a gold head, he has pimped out accessories including a gold communications case, golden blaster, sunglasses, leopard cloak and money to burn!

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Storm Shadow (Arctic Mission)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Storm Shadow (Arctic Mission) 
Storm Shadow Arctic Mission variation is outfitted for any snow related missions. Accessories included are golden bow, arrow and quiver pack, grappling hook, removable hood, scythe, katana and sheath. Exclusive to Amazon.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Baroness with C.O.I.L. Motorcycle
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Baroness with C.O.I.L. Motorcycle 
Special Mission Cobra Island Baroness and C.O.I.L bike. A brilliant master of disguise and psychological manipulation, the Baroness is in control of every situation. Her only desire is to watch the world unravel, and she will use her inherited wealth, connections, and skills to make it happen, no matter where she needs to swear her allegiance. Includes two gold handguns, two mountable assault rifles, cobra knife, snake gun and helmet.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Trooper
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Trooper 
Classified Series Special Missions: Cobra Island Cobra Troopers form the core of the Cobra forces. Their ranks are made up of  criminals from around the world who have been drawn to the sinister hiss and dark message that is the Cobra call. Typically wearing masks to hide their identity, they carry out chaos-causing missions handed down from Cobra Commander, who they faithfully serve without question. Includes 2 hand guns, 2 assault rifles, knife, helmet with face shield, glasses and pouch.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Roadblock (Cobra Island)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Roadblock (Cobra Island) 
Classified Series Special Missions: Cobra Island Roadblock's dream was to be a gourmet chef. He was working as a bouncer to earn money to attend the Escoffier School in France when an army recruiter convinced him that the army could train him to be a chef. Roadblock joined but found army menus and preparation techniques too appalling. Transferred to the infantry. Includes heavy machine gun, Broiler, and sunglasses.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Beach Head
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Beach Head 
Classified Series Special Missions: Cobra Island Wayne Beach Head Sneeden was a lane instructor at the Ranger School in Fort Benning and an Observer/Advisor at the Covert Ops School in Central America. He's meticulous, patient, and strong-willed. He likes getting up at 0500 hours to take a ten-mile run and PT (Physical Training) session before breakfast. He enjoys squatting motionless beside a jungle trail for three days straight waiting to ambush bad guys that might never show up. What he hates is people who aren't interested in doing their best. Qualified expert all NATO and Warsaw Pact small arms. Target exclusive DPCI 087-16-2012

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Red Ninja
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Red Ninja 
Red Ninja Vipers are ruthless mercenaries who work strictly for Cobra Commander. They hail from the most feared ninja warrior clans on the planet, fighting with the skill of the masters, and earn top dollar for their services. Includes a katana.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Gung Ho
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Gung Ho 
A tireless brawler who is physically incapable of experiencing fear, Gung-Ho punches first and lets someone else clean up the mess. A genetic anomaly that inhibits his fear response makes him willing to enter any situation, no matter the personal danger. His bayou roots make him a perfect selection for missions involving jungle or swamp terrain. Includes his energy weapon.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Commander
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Commander 
The leader of Cobra is the most treacherous and despicable criminal the world has ever known. Cobra Commander has channeled his boundless ambitions into building a worldwide criminal organization with one goal: global domination at any cost. Highly intelligent and dangerously unstable. Wields a strange form of charm that can twist intentions and morals, making his poisonous words seem plausible and relatable and masking the true motives behind his treachery. This Cobra Commander figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and character-inspired accessories, including his signature sword.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Commander (Regal)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra Commander (Regal) 
This Cobra Commander Regal Variant figure comes ready for action, with a color scheme inspired by the 1980s animated series, multiple points of articulation for high poseability, and character-inspired accessories, including his signature sword. And with custom artwork by Dan Mumford, the G.I. Joe Classified Series Cobra Commander package will make a mark on shelves.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Scarlett
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Scarlett 
The G.I. JOE Classified Series Scarlett Action Figure features a classic design updated to bring the iconic G.I. JOE field operative, a competitive martial artist with intelligence levels that are off the charts and a selfstyled warrior of justice whos not afraid to bend the rules to do whats right, into the modern era. The figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation making it highly poseable and accessories inspired by the characters rich history, including Scarlett's signature crossbow. Newer Scarlett repaint are known as Field Variant and are UPC: 5010993931484, F5359

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Duke
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Duke 
Duke is the go-to squad leader capable of command on any type of mission. A decorated operative who has set records, received commendations, and achieved honors every step of the way, Duke has distinguished himself even among the elite ranks of G.I. Joe field commanders. Worthy of a top-level command post, but believes that leaders who aren't in the field aren't worthy of being leaders. Newer Duke repaints are known as Field Variant and are UPC: 5010993931460, F5358

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Destro
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Destro 
A brilliant businessman, weapons developer, CEO and engineer, Destro strictly adheres to a quiet personal code that places war, profit, and the success of his own family above all other things. He excels at brokering deals, clandestine negotiations, and double-cross missions. The refined and highly advanced weaponry produced by his company, M.A.R.S Industries, continues to reshape modern warfare. The accessories inspired by his rich history include his communications case, laser pistol and golden blaster.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Snake Eyes
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Snake Eyes 
Snake Eyes is a total mystery, but when it comes to G.I. Joe operations, he’s the best there is. Snake Eyes is a natural fighter with abilities that border on the supernatural. His unique blend of skill, stealth, Arashikage ninja training, and strength of character makes him an unparalleled combination: a hybrid ninja-commando who still hasn’t reached the limits of his potential or his true destiny as a warrior. Ninja figure includes seven accessories.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Roadblock
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Roadblock 
The G.I. JOE Classified Series Roadblock Action Figure features a classic design updated to bring the iconic G.I. JOE one-man wrecking crew, a gentle giant with exceptional strength and the courage to face any threat, into the modern era. The figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation making it highly poseable and accessories inspired by the characters rich history, including a heavy artillery blaster. Newer Roadblock repaint are known as Field Variant and are UPC: 5010993931415, F5360

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Dragonfly (XH-1) Assault Copter
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Dragonfly (XH-1) Assault Copter 
While on a covert mission infiltrating Cobra Island, our G.I. Joe operative uncovered secret plans by Cobra to unleash a fleet of heavily armored tanks in their bid for world domination. That intelligence prompted G.I. Joe High Command to authorize commissioning HasLab developers to mass produce a Joe vehicle with significant counter-strike capabilities. The results of that collaboration are the very first G.I. Joe Assault Copter Dragonfly (XH-1) in 6-inch scale.



This two-seat Assault Copter offering represents the pinnacle of G.I. Joe’s anti-armor technology. It’s a massive 34.09 inches/865.79 MM long from the tip of the front turret barrel to tail, 11.33 inches/287.92 MM tall from skids to rotor, and 13.77 inches/349.76 MM wide wing tip to wing tip. It’s certain to send a shiver down the slithery spine of every Cobra within sight.



This crowdfunded project will run from 11:00AM ET on June 5th, 2023, to 11:59PM ET on July 17th. If successful, the project is expected to begin shipping in Summer 2024.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra H.I.S.S. Tank
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Cobra H.I.S.S. Tank 
Never before has an undertaking such as this occurred – our project is the first 6-inch scale G.I. Joe Classified Series Cobra H.I.S.S. vehicle for which everyone has been clamoring. A mere C$411.08 grants backers the base offering of my technological wonder, the H.I.S.S., as well as a highly-articulated Cobra H.I.S.S. Driver Action Figure with premium deco, detailing, and articulation for poseability. The vehicle itself contains an astounding level of detail and features allowing for myriad posing and display options.



This crowdfunded project will run from June 29th 2022 11:00AM ET to August 15th 11:59PM ET. If successful, the project will begin shipping Fall 2023.

name: G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Snake Eyes (Deluxe)
description:
G.I. Joe 6" Classified Series Snake Eyes (Deluxe) 
This exclusive Snake Eyes figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability. Plus, the figure comes with an exclusive Arashikage Ninja Clan-inspired gear storage rack with the same premium detailing found on the figure. Load it up with the included accessories, including the character's iconic katana, sheath, and multiple other pieces of ninja gear.
